title: Apple dominates top 10 best-selling smartphone list.
text: Posted Feb 21, 2024 At 12:30 PM UTC We already know that Apple dethroned Samsung by selling the most phones globally in 2023, now we can see the model mix according to data compiled by Counterpoint Research. Samsung’s lucrative flagship phones were a no-show on the list, with only mid-range devices taking up the bottom three positions. / Sign up for Verge Deals to get deals on products we've tested sent to your inbox daily.
